English subtitles are needed for all foreign languages in this film
Languages:
Spanish | Chinese (some dialogue) | Wolof (some dialogue)

I have to disagree with you Daker9 because I think it's fairly dreadful. I checked numerous points of the film with this subtitles and while it helps in about 50% of the time, I noticed it missed words out or basically gives random and mis-translated responses to some dialogue.

I can accept that this may be fine for some people but to miss the dialogue due to translation errors and non-translation of dialogue leaves you missing the film.

I can wait. If you can't then accept this dialogue.
